title: MY BABY<Leblanc>♥
body: ty riot for reverting her q{{champion:7}}

replies.body: Lol guys they are talking about the AP ratio. It used to be 0.4, was nerfed to 0.3, then reverted to 0.4
Her rework took a little skill to play.. her revert just made her back into the confusing facemashy mess that she is now.
More importantly it had waveclear. Like ridiculously amazing waveclear.
Why? Her new Q was so much better.
